content_list.headline: Aiming for the peak
content_list.text: Itraws aims to become a leading provider of business and social technologies to help Africa prosper.

content_list.headline: Our Mission
content_list.text: Itraws desires to become a prominent business and social technology provider to assist Africa prosper. We are creating technologies that will improve markets by reducing reliance on old methods using cutting-edge technology and engineering.
